Description: Faience scarab from the reign of Amenhotep III.
Curator's comments: p. 148, no. 132 E.H Cline (1994). Sailing the Wine-Dark Sea. International Trade and the Late Bronze Age Aegean. Oxford.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1913 / Catalogue of Egyptian scarabs, etc. in the British Museum (1915)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2014-2015, 13 Nov-13 Febr, Paris, Musee du Louvre, Rhodos: a Gate from and to the Eastern Mediterranean 2019-2020 21 Nov-8 Mar, London, BM, SEG, Troy
